toy-projects.name: Simple Calculator
toy-projects.description: A basic calculator written in vanilla JavaScript and vanilla css. Not coded to be maintained - so a bit sloppy and untested. Desktop only: not responsive or mobile friendly.

toy-projects.name: Simon Game
toy-projects.description: A clone of the electronic game Simon with sound and lights! Desktop only: not responsive or mobile friendly.

toy-projects.name: Conway's Game of Life
toy-projects.description: Conway's game of life implemented in JavaScript with React. Mobile-first, responsive.

applications.name: Newsy
applications.description: A web client for searching the newsapi.org api. Provides a simple interface to the many search options available. Uses a simple express server to act as an api-key providing proxy to the newsapi.org site.

applications.name: HotkeyCommander
applications.description: A javascript module, published to npm, that provides a drop-in, robust hotkey management system with simple end-user customization through hotkey recording.

applications.name: JackBeNimble
applications.description: A google chrome extension that provides user-configurable order-entry hotkeys for multiple bitcoin exchanges. Easily extensible.

applications.name: FlyptoX
applications.description: A full-featured cryptocurrency exchange written in Node.js. Built over the course of about 5 weeks, I was the 'project owner' and a full stack developer on this 'agile', remote, project built by a team of 5.
